sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM USERS
DOMAIN = #DOMAIN#
USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#

SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM USERS AA
AA.DOMAIN = #DOMAIN#
AA.USERS_JUMIN1 = #USERS_JUMIN1#
AA.USERS_JUMIN2 =#USERS_JUMIN2#
AA.USERS_LICENCENUM =#USERS_LICENCENUM#

SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM ACCOUNT
ACCOUNT_IDX = #USERS_IDX#

SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM RESERVEID
RESERVEID_ID||'@'||DOMAIN =#USERS_IDX#

SELECT AA.USERS_IDX, AA.USERS_ID, AA.DOMAIN, AA.USERS_PASSWD, AA.USERS_NAME, AA.USERS_ENGNAME, AA.USERS_HOMEDIR, AA.USERS_PERMIT, AA.USERS_AUTH, AA.USERS_NICKNAME, AA.USERS_JUMIN1, AA.USERS_JUMIN2, AA.USERS_SEX, AA.USERS_BIRTH, AA.USERS_ISSOLAR, AA.USERS_CELLNO, AA.USERS_FAXNO, AA.USERS_TELNO, AA.USERS_ZIPCODE, AA.USERS_ADDRESS1, AA.USERS_ADDRESS2, AA.USERS_JOBCODE, AA.USERS_COMPNAME, AA.USERS_DEPARTMENT, AA.USERS_JOBTITLE, AA.USERS_PREVEMAIL, AA.USERS_SCHOOLING, AA.USERS_INTEREST, AA.USERS_LICENCENUM, AA.USERS_ISOPEN, AA.USERS_JOINDATE, AA.USERS_EXPIREDDATE, AA.USERS_LOGCOUNT, AA.USERS_LASTHOST, AA.USERS_MAX_VOLUME, AA.USERS_CUR_VOLUME, AA.USERS_LASTDATE, AA.USERS_SIGNATURE, AA.USERS_SIGNATURESTMT, AA.USERS_AUTORE, AA.USERS_AUTORESTMT, AA.USERS_USENAME, AA.USERS_SENDBOX, AA.USERS_DELBOX, AA.USERS_AUTO_DEL, AA.USERS_LISTNUM, AA.USERS_ISVOTE, AA.USERS_ABSENT, TO_CHAR(AA.USERS_ABSENT_SDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USERS_ABSENT_SDATE, TO_CHAR(AA.USERS_ABSENT_EDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USERS_ABSENT_EDATE, AA.USERS_ABSENT_RESTMT, AA.USERS_OPT_FWD, AA.USERS_OPT_FWD_SAVE, AA.USERS_FWD_LIST, AA.USERS_READDR, AA.USERS_SPAM_LEVEL, AA.USERS_DEL_WASTE, AA.USERS_DEL_SPAM, AA.USERS_LANG, AA.USERS_MAIL_ALARM, AA.USERS_ALARM_SOUND, AA.USERS_INDEX_PAGE, AA.USERS_RECEIVE_INFOMAIL, AA.USERS_MAIL_VIEW, AA.USERS_MAIL_INJURE, AA.USERS_ORGANIZE_IDX, AA.USERS_AUTHORITY_IDX, AA.USERS_SMS_QUOTA, AA.USERS_SMS_MAX_QUOTA, AA.USERS_MAIL_QUOTA, AA.USERS_MEMO, AA.USERS_MSG_YN, AA.USERS_MENTO_YN, AA.USERS_USETAG, AA.USERS_USE_MAIL_PREVIEW, AA.MAX_BIG_UPLOAD_SIZE, AA.USERS_PWD_FAIL_COUNT, AA.USERS_PWD_LOCKED , AA.USERS_BOARD_AUTH, AA.USERS_INFO_OPEN_AGREEMENT, AA.USERS_FWD_AUTH, TO_CHAR(AA.USERS_JOINDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USERS_JOINDATE, AA.USERS_AUTORE_LIST, AA.USERS_OPT_AUTORE, AA.USERS_DELEGATE, AA.USERS_DELEGATE_LIST, AA.USERS_LOGIN_MODE , AA.USERS_BG_COLOR, AA.USERS_MAIL_VIEW_MODE, AA.TAG_FILTER_LEVEL FROM USERS AA
AA.USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#

SELECT USERS_IDX, USERS_NAME FROM USERS
USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
USERS_NAME = #USERS_NAME#

SELECT AA.USERS_IDX, AA.USERS_ID, AA.DOMAIN, AA.USERS_PASSWD, AA.USERS_NAME, AA.USERS_ENGNAME, AA.USERS_HOMEDIR, AA.USERS_PERMIT, AA.USERS_AUTH, AA.USERS_NICKNAME, AA.USERS_JUMIN1, AA.USERS_JUMIN2, AA.USERS_SEX, AA.USERS_BIRTH, AA.USERS_ISSOLAR, AA.USERS_CELLNO, AA.USERS_FAXNO, AA.USERS_TELNO, AA.USERS_ZIPCODE, AA.USERS_ADDRESS1, AA.USERS_ADDRESS2, AA.USERS_JOBCODE, AA.USERS_COMPNAME, AA.USERS_DEPARTMENT, AA.USERS_PREVEMAIL, AA.USERS_SCHOOLING, AA.USERS_INTEREST, AA.USERS_LICENCENUM, AA.USERS_ISOPEN, AA.USERS_JOINDATE, AA.USERS_EXPIREDDATE, AA.USERS_LOGCOUNT, AA.USERS_LASTHOST, AA.USERS_MAX_VOLUME, AA.USERS_CUR_VOLUME, AA.USERS_LASTDATE, AA.USERS_SIGNATURE, AA.USERS_SIGNATURESTMT, AA.USERS_AUTORE, AA.USERS_AUTORESTMT, AA.USERS_USENAME, AA.USERS_SENDBOX, AA.USERS_DELBOX, AA.USERS_AUTO_DEL, AA.USERS_LISTNUM, AA.USERS_ISVOTE, AA.USERS_ABSENT, TO_CHAR(AA.USERS_ABSENT_SDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USERS_ABSENT_SDATE, TO_CHAR(AA.USERS_ABSENT_EDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USERS_ABSENT_EDATE, AA.USERS_ABSENT_RESTMT, AA.USERS_OPT_FWD, AA.USERS_OPT_FWD_SAVE, AA.USERS_FWD_LIST, AA.USERS_READDR, AA.USERS_SPAM_LEVEL, AA.USERS_DEL_WASTE, AA.USERS_DEL_SPAM, AA.USERS_LANG, AA.USERS_MAIL_ALARM, AA.USERS_ALARM_SOUND, AA.USERS_INDEX_PAGE, AA.USERS_RECEIVE_INFOMAIL, AA.USERS_MAIL_VIEW, AA.USERS_MAIL_INJURE, AA.USERS_ORGANIZE_IDX, AA.USERS_AUTHORITY_IDX, AA.USERS_SMS_QUOTA, AA.USERS_MAIL_QUOTA, AA.USERS_MEMO, AA.USERS_MSG_YN, AA.USERS_MENTO_YN, AA.USERS_USETAG, AA.USERS_USE_MAIL_PREVIEW, AA.USERS_PWD_FAIL_COUNT, AA.USERS_PWD_LOCKED, AA.USERS_BOARD_AUTH, AA.USERS_INFO_OPEN_AGREEMENT, AA.USERS_FWD_AUTH, AA.USERS_SMS_MAX_QUOTA FROM USERS AA
AA.USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
AA.DOMAIN = #DOMAIN#
AA.USERS_NAME LIKE '%'||#USERS_NAME#||'%'
USERS_AUTH IN ('A', 'S')
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO USERS ( USERS_IDX, USERS_ID, DOMAIN, USERS_PASSWD, USERS_NAME, USERS_ENGNAME, USERS_HOMEDIR, USERS_PERMIT, USERS_AUTH, USERS_NICKNAME, USERS_JUMIN1, USERS_JUMIN2, USERS_SEX, USERS_BIRTH, USERS_ISSOLAR, USERS_CELLNO, USERS_FAXNO, USERS_TELNO, USERS_ZIPCODE, USERS_ADDRESS1, USERS_ADDRESS2, USERS_JOBCODE, USERS_COMPNAME, USERS_DEPARTMENT, USERS_PREVEMAIL, USERS_SCHOOLING, USERS_INTEREST, USERS_LICENCENUM, USERS_ISOPEN, USERS_JOINDATE, USERS_EXPIREDDATE, USERS_LOGCOUNT, USERS_LASTHOST, USERS_MAX_VOLUME, USERS_CUR_VOLUME, USERS_LASTDATE, USERS_SIGNATURE, USERS_SIGNATURESTMT, USERS_AUTORE, USERS_AUTORESTMT, USERS_USENAME, USERS_SENDBOX, USERS_DELBOX, USERS_AUTO_DEL, USERS_LISTNUM, USERS_ISVOTE, USERS_ABSENT, USERS_ABSENT_SDATE, USERS_ABSENT_EDATE, USERS_ABSENT_RESTMT, USERS_OPT_FWD, USERS_OPT_FWD_SAVE, USERS_FWD_LIST, USERS_READDR, USERS_SPAM_LEVEL, USERS_DEL_WASTE, USERS_DEL_SPAM, USERS_LANG, USERS_MAIL_ALARM, USERS_ALARM_SOUND, USERS_INDEX_PAGE, USERS_RECEIVE_INFOMAIL, USERS_MAIL_VIEW, USERS_MAIL_INJURE, USERS_ORGANIZE_IDX, USERS_AUTHORITY_IDX, USERS_SMS_QUOTA, USERS_MAIL_QUOTA, USERS_MEMO, USERS_MSG_YN, USERS_MENTO_YN, USERS_USETAG, USERS_USE_MAIL_PREVIEW, USERS_DELEGATE, USERS_DELEGATE_LIST ) VALUES ( #USERS_IDX#, #USERS_ID#, #DOMAIN#, #USERS_PASSWD#, #USERS_NAME#, #USERS_ENGNAME#, #USERS_HOMEDIR#, #USERS_PERMIT#, #USERS_AUTH#, #USERS_NICKNAME#, #USERS_JUMIN1#, #USERS_JUMIN2#, #USERS_SEX#, #USERS_BIRTH#, #USERS_ISSOLAR#, #USERS_CELLNO#, #USERS_FAXNO#, #USERS_TELNO#, #USERS_ZIPCODE#, #USERS_ADDRESS1#, #USERS_ADDRESS2#, #USERS_JOBCODE#, #USERS_COMPNAME#, #USERS_DEPARTMENT#, #USERS_PREVEMAIL#, #USERS_SCHOOLING#, #USERS_INTEREST#, #USERS_LICENCENUM#, #USERS_ISOPEN#, SYSDATE, #USERS_EXPIREDDATE#, #USERS_LOGCOUNT#, #USERS_LASTHOST#, #USERS_MAX_VOLUME#, #USERS_CUR_VOLUME#, #USERS_LASTDATE#, #USERS_SIGNATURE#, #USERS_SIGNATURESTMT#, #USERS_AUTORE#, #USERS_AUTORESTMT#, #USERS_USENAME#, #USERS_SENDBOX#, #USERS_DELBOX#, #USERS_AUTO_DEL#, #USERS_LISTNUM#, #USERS_ISVOTE#, #USERS_ABSENT#, #USERS_ABSENT_SDATE#, #USERS_ABSENT_EDATE#, #USERS_ABSENT_RESTMT#, #USERS_OPT_FWD#, #USERS_OPT_FWD_SAVE#, #USERS_FWD_LIST#, #USERS_READDR#, #USERS_SPAM_LEVEL#, #USERS_DEL_WASTE#, #USERS_DEL_SPAM#, #USERS_LANG#, #USERS_MAIL_ALARM#, #USERS_ALARM_SOUND#, #USERS_INDEX_PAGE#, #USERS_RECEIVE_INFOMAIL#, #USERS_MAIL_VIEW#, #USERS_MAIL_INJURE#, #USERS_ORGANIZE_IDX#, #USERS_AUTHORITY_IDX#, #USERS_SMS_QUOTA#, #USERS_MAIL_QUOTA#, #USERS_MEMO#, #USERS_MSG_YN#, #USERS_MENTO_YN#, #USERS_USETAG#, #USERS_USE_MAIL_PREVIEW#, #USERS_DELEGATE#, #USERS_DELEGATE_LIST# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE USERS SET USERS_LOGCOUNT = USERS_LOGCOUNT+1, USERS_LASTHOST = #USERS_LASTHOST#, USERS_LASTDATE = SYSDATE, USERS_CUR_VOLUME = #USERS_CUR_VOLUME# , USERS_PWD_FAIL_COUNT =0 , USERS_PWD_LOCKED ='N' WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
UPDATE USERS SET USERS_CUR_VOLUME = #USERS_CUR_VOLUME# WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
UPDATE USERS SET USERS_PASSWD = #USERS_PASSWD# WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#

UPDATE USERS SET USERS_NAME = #USERS_NAME#, USERS_ENGNAME = #USERS_ENGNAME#, USERS_NICKNAME = #USERS_NICKNAME#, USERS_LICENCENUM =#USERS_LICENCENUM#, USERS_USENAME = #USERS_USENAME#, USERS_SEX = #USERS_SEX#, USERS_BIRTH = #USERS_BIRTH#, USERS_ISSOLAR = #USERS_ISSOLAR#, USERS_CELLNO = #USERS_CELLNO#, USERS_FAXNO = #USERS_FAXNO#, USERS_TELNO = #USERS_TELNO#, USERS_ZIPCODE = #USERS_ZIPCODE#, USERS_ADDRESS1 = #USERS_ADDRESS1#, USERS_ADDRESS2 = #USERS_ADDRESS2#, USERS_JOBCODE = #USERS_JOBCODE#, USERS_COMPNAME = #USERS_COMPNAME#, USERS_DEPARTMENT = #USERS_DEPARTMENT#, USERS_JOBTITLE = #USERS_JOBTITLE#, USERS_SCHOOLING = #USERS_SCHOOLING#, USERS_INTEREST = #USERS_INTEREST#, USERS_ISOPEN = #USERS_ISOPEN#, USERS_MEMO = #USERS_MEMO#, USERS_PREVEMAIL = #USERS_PREVEMAIL#, USERS_JUMIN1 = #USERS_JUMIN1#, USERS_JUMIN2 = #USERS_JUMIN2#, USERS_LANG = #USERS_LANG# WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM USERS
USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
USERS_ID = #USERS_ID#
DOMAIN = #DOMAIN#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE USERS set users_id = users_id WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#

UPDATE USERS
USERS_AUTH = #USERS_AUTH# , USERS_BOARD_AUTH = #USERS_BOARD_AUTH#
USERS_PERMIT = #USERS_PERMIT# , USERS_PWD_LOCKED = #USERS_PWD_LOCKED#, USERS_PWD_FAIL_COUNT = 0
USERS_DELEGATE_LIST = #USERS_DELEGATE_LIST#
USERS_ABSENT = #USERS_ABSENT#, USERS_OPT_AUTORE = #USERS_OPT_AUTORE#, USERS_AUTORE_LIST = #USERS_AUTORE_LIST#, USERS_ABSENT_SDATE = TO_DATE(#USERS_ABSENT_SDATE#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), USERS_ABSENT_EDATE = TO_DATE(#USERS_ABSENT_EDATE#, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), USERS_ABSENT_RESTMT = #USERS_ABSENT_RESTMT#
USERS_SIGNATURE = #USERS_SIGNATURE#, USERS_AUTORE = #USERS_AUTORE#, USERS_SENDBOX = #USERS_SENDBOX#, USERS_OPT_FWD = #USERS_OPT_FWD#, USERS_OPT_FWD_SAVE = #USERS_OPT_FWD_SAVE#
USERS_OPT_FWD = #USERS_OPT_FWD#
USERS_READDR = #USERS_READDR#
USERS_FWD_LIST = #USERS_FWD_LIST#
USERS_SPAM_LEVEL = #USERS_SPAM_LEVEL#
USERS_MAIL_INJURE = #USERS_MAIL_INJURE#
USERS_SMS_QUOTA = #USERS_SMS_QUOTA#
USERS_SMS_QUOTA = USERS_SMS_QUOTA - #minusQuota#
USERS_LANG = #USERS_LANG#, USERS_INDEX_PAGE = #USERS_INDEX_PAGE#, USERS_USENAME = #USERS_USENAME#
USERS_USE_MAIL_PREVIEW = #USERS_USE_MAIL_PREVIEW#, USERS_LISTNUM = #USERS_LISTNUM#, USERS_USETAG = #USERS_USETAG#, USERS_DELBOX = #USERS_DELBOX#, USERS_DEL_SPAM = #USERS_DEL_SPAM#, USERS_AUTO_DEL = #USERS_AUTO_DEL#, USERS_DEL_WASTE = #USERS_DEL_WASTE#
$COLUMN_NAME$ = #CONTENT#
USERS_INFO_OPEN_AGREEMENT = #USERS_INFO_OPEN_AGREEMENT#, USERS_PREVEMAIL = #USERS_PREVEMAIL#
USERS_LOGIN_MODE = #USERS_LOGIN_MODE#
USERS_LANG = #USERS_LANG#, USERS_INDEX_PAGE = #USERS_INDEX_PAGE#, USERS_USENAME = #USERS_USENAME#, USERS_ENGNAME = #USERS_ENGNAME#, USERS_NICKNAME = #USERS_NICKNAME#, USERS_DEPARTMENT = #USERS_DEPARTMENT#, USERS_TELNO = #USERS_TELNO#, USERS_CELLNO = #USERS_CELLNO#
USERS_BG_COLOR = #USERS_BG_COLOR#
WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT AA.USERS_IDX, AA.USERS_ID, AA.DOMAIN, AA.USERS_PASSWD, AA.USERS_NAME, AA.USERS_ENGNAME, AA.USERS_HOMEDIR, AA.USERS_PERMIT, AA.USERS_AUTH, AA.USERS_NICKNAME, AA.USERS_JUMIN1, AA.USERS_JUMIN2, AA.USERS_SEX, AA.USERS_BIRTH, AA.USERS_ISSOLAR, AA.USERS_CELLNO, AA.USERS_FAXNO, AA.USERS_TELNO, AA.USERS_ZIPCODE, AA.USERS_ADDRESS1, AA.USERS_ADDRESS2, AA.USERS_JOBCODE, AA.USERS_COMPNAME, AA.USERS_DEPARTMENT, AA.USERS_PREVEMAIL, AA.USERS_SCHOOLING, AA.USERS_INTEREST, AA.USERS_LICENCENUM, AA.USERS_ISOPEN, AA.USERS_JOINDATE, AA.USERS_EXPIREDDATE, AA.USERS_LOGCOUNT, AA.USERS_LASTHOST, AA.USERS_MAX_VOLUME, AA.USERS_CUR_VOLUME, TO_CHAR(AA.USERS_LASTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') USERS_LASTDATE, AA.USERS_SIGNATURE, AA.USERS_SIGNATURESTMT, AA.USERS_AUTORE, AA.USERS_AUTORESTMT, AA.USERS_USENAME, AA.USERS_SENDBOX, AA.USERS_DELBOX, AA.USERS_AUTO_DEL, AA.USERS_LISTNUM, AA.USERS_ISVOTE, AA.USERS_ABSENT, TO_CHAR(AA.USERS_ABSENT_SDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USERS_ABSENT_SDATE, TO_CHAR(AA.USERS_ABSENT_EDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USERS_ABSENT_EDATE, AA.USERS_ABSENT_RESTMT, AA.USERS_OPT_FWD, AA.USERS_OPT_FWD_SAVE, AA.USERS_FWD_LIST, AA.USERS_READDR, AA.USERS_SPAM_LEVEL, AA.USERS_DEL_WASTE, AA.USERS_DEL_SPAM, AA.USERS_LANG, AA.USERS_MAIL_ALARM, AA.USERS_ALARM_SOUND, AA.USERS_INDEX_PAGE, AA.USERS_RECEIVE_INFOMAIL, AA.USERS_MAIL_VIEW, AA.USERS_MAIL_INJURE, AA.USERS_ORGANIZE_IDX, AA.USERS_AUTHORITY_IDX, AA.USERS_SMS_QUOTA, AA.USERS_MAIL_QUOTA, AA.USERS_MEMO, AA.USERS_MSG_YN, AA.USERS_MENTO_YN, AA.USERS_USETAG, AA.USERS_USE_MAIL_PREVIEW, AA.USERS_PWD_LOCKED , AA.USERS_BOARD_AUTH, AA.USERS_INFO_OPEN_AGREEMENT, AA.USERS_FWD_AUTH,AA.USERS_SMS_MAX_QUOTA, CEIL((ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY $orderCol$ $orderType$))/$USERS_LISTNUM$) PAGENUM FROM USERS AA
AA.DOMAIN = #DOMAIN#
USERS_ID LIKE '%'||#USERS_ID[]#||'%'
USERS_NAME LIKE '%'||#USERS_NAME[]#||'%'
USERS_JUMIN1 LIKE '%'||#USERS_JUMIN1[]#||'%'
USERS_JUMIN2 LIKE '%'||#USERS_JUMIN2[]#||'%'
USERS_DEPARTMENT LIKE '%'||#USERS_DEPARTMENT[]#||'%'
USERS_LICENCENUM LIKE '%'||#USERS_LICENCENUM[]#||'%'
USERS_CUR_VOLUME - USERS_MAX_VOLUME >= #USERS_CUR_VOLUME#
USERS_LASTDATE <= SYSDATE - #USERS_LASTDATE[]#
USERS_PERMIT = #USERS_PERMIT[]#
) CC WHERE CC.PAGENUM = #nPage#

SELECT AA.USERS_IDX, AA.USERS_ID, AA.DOMAIN, AA.USERS_PASSWD, AA.USERS_NAME, AA.USERS_ENGNAME, AA.USERS_HOMEDIR, AA.USERS_PERMIT, AA.USERS_AUTH, AA.USERS_NICKNAME, AA.USERS_JUMIN1, AA.USERS_JUMIN2, AA.USERS_SEX, AA.USERS_BIRTH, AA.USERS_ISSOLAR, AA.USERS_CELLNO, AA.USERS_FAXNO, AA.USERS_TELNO, AA.USERS_ZIPCODE, AA.USERS_ADDRESS1, AA.USERS_ADDRESS2, AA.USERS_JOBCODE, AA.USERS_COMPNAME, AA.USERS_DEPARTMENT, AA.USERS_PREVEMAIL, AA.USERS_SCHOOLING, AA.USERS_INTEREST, AA.USERS_LICENCENUM, AA.USERS_ISOPEN, AA.USERS_JOINDATE, AA.USERS_EXPIREDDATE, AA.USERS_LOGCOUNT, AA.USERS_LASTHOST, AA.USERS_MAX_VOLUME, AA.USERS_CUR_VOLUME, AA.USERS_LASTDATE, AA.USERS_SIGNATURE, AA.USERS_SIGNATURESTMT, AA.USERS_AUTORE, AA.USERS_AUTORESTMT, AA.USERS_USENAME, AA.USERS_SENDBOX, AA.USERS_DELBOX, AA.USERS_AUTO_DEL, AA.USERS_LISTNUM, AA.USERS_ISVOTE, AA.USERS_ABSENT, TO_CHAR(AA.USERS_ABSENT_SDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USERS_ABSENT_SDATE, TO_CHAR(AA.USERS_ABSENT_EDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USERS_ABSENT_EDATE, AA.USERS_ABSENT_RESTMT, AA.USERS_OPT_FWD, AA.USERS_OPT_FWD_SAVE, AA.USERS_FWD_LIST, AA.USERS_READDR, AA.USERS_SPAM_LEVEL, AA.USERS_DEL_WASTE, AA.USERS_DEL_SPAM, AA.USERS_LANG, AA.USERS_MAIL_ALARM, AA.USERS_ALARM_SOUND, AA.USERS_INDEX_PAGE, AA.USERS_RECEIVE_INFOMAIL, AA.USERS_MAIL_VIEW, AA.USERS_MAIL_INJURE, AA.USERS_ORGANIZE_IDX, AA.USERS_AUTHORITY_IDX, AA.USERS_SMS_QUOTA, AA.USERS_SMS_MAX_QUOTA, AA.USERS_MAIL_QUOTA, AA.USERS_MEMO, AA.USERS_MSG_YN, AA.USERS_MENTO_YN, AA.USERS_USETAG, AA.USERS_USE_MAIL_PREVIEW, AA.USERS_PWD_LOCKED , AA.USERS_BOARD_AUTH, AA.USERS_INFO_OPEN_AGREEMENT, AA.USERS_FWD_AUTH FROM USERS AA
AA.DOMAIN = #DOMAIN#
AND USERS_ID LIKE '%'||#USERS_ID[]#||'%'
AND USERS_NAME LIKE '%'||#USERS_NAME[]#||'%'
#USERS_JUMIN1[]#
#USERS_JUMIN2[]#
AND USERS_DEPARTMENT LIKE '%'||#USERS_DEPARTMENT[]#||'%'
#USERS_LICENCENUM[]#
AND USERS_CUR_VOLUME - USERS_MAX_VOLUME >= #USERS_CUR_VOLUME#
AND USERS_LASTDATE <= SYSDATE - #USERS_LASTDATE[]#
AND USERS_PERMIT = #USERS_PERMIT[]#

SELECT COUNT(AA.USERS_IDX) CNT FROM USERS AA
AA.DOMAIN = #DOMAIN#
USERS_ID LIKE '%'||#USERS_ID[]#||'%'
USERS_NAME LIKE '%'||#USERS_NAME[]#||'%'
USERS_JUMIN1 LIKE '%'||#USERS_JUMIN1[]#||'%'
USERS_JUMIN2 LIKE '%'||#USERS_JUMIN2[]#||'%'
USERS_DEPARTMENT LIKE '%'||#USERS_DEPARTMENT[]#||'%'
USERS_LICENCENUM LIKE '%'||#USERS_LICENCENUM[]#||'%'
USERS_CUR_VOLUME - USERS_MAX_VOLUME >= #USERS_CUR_VOLUME#
USERS_LASTDATE <= SYSDATE - #USERS_LASTDATE[]#
USERS_PERMIT = #USERS_PERMIT[]#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE USERS
USERS_MAX_VOLUME = USERS_MAX_VOLUME + (#USERS_MAX_VOLUME#)
USERS_MAX_VOLUME = #USERS_MAX_VOLUME#
USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
USERS_IDX LIKE '%@'||#DOMAIN#

UPDATE USERS SET USERS_NAME = #USERS_NAME#, USERS_ENGNAME = #USERS_ENGNAME#, USERS_NICKNAME = #USERS_NICKNAME#, USERS_JOBCODE = #USERS_JOBCODE#, USERS_PREVEMAIL = #USERS_PREVEMAIL#, USERS_SCHOOLING = #USERS_SCHOOLING#, USERS_INTEREST = #USERS_INTEREST#, USERS_ISOPEN = #USERS_ISOPEN#, USERS_MAX_VOLUME = #USERS_MAX_VOLUME#, USERS_PERMIT = #USERS_PERMIT#, USERS_USENAME = #USERS_USENAME#, USERS_AUTORE = #USERS_AUTORE#, USERS_ABSENT = #USERS_ABSENT#, USERS_OPT_FWD = #USERS_OPT_FWD#, USERS_SIGNATURE = #USERS_SIGNATURE#, USERS_MAIL_VIEW = #USERS_MAIL_VIEW#, USERS_LISTNUM = #USERS_LISTNUM#, USERS_MAIL_ALARM = #USERS_MAIL_ALARM#, USERS_ALARM_SOUND = #USERS_ALARM_SOUND#, USERS_DEL_SPAM = #USERS_DEL_SPAM#, USERS_AUTO_DEL = #USERS_AUTO_DEL#, USERS_DEL_WASTE = #USERS_DEL_WASTE#, USERS_SENDBOX = #USERS_SENDBOX#, USERS_DELBOX = #USERS_DELBOX#, USERS_SMS_QUOTA = #USERS_SMS_QUOTA#, USERS_SMS_MAX_QUOTA = #USERS_SMS_MAX_QUOTA#, USERS_MEMO = #USERS_MEMO# , USERS_AUTHORITY_IDX = #USERS_AUTHORITY_IDX#, USERS_DELEGATE = #USERS_DELEGATE#, USERS_DELEGATE_LIST = #USERS_DELEGATE_LIST#, USERS_JUMIN1 = #USERS_JUMIN1#, USERS_JUMIN2 = #USERS_JUMIN2#, USERS_CELLNO = #USERS_CELLNO#, USERS_TELNO = #USERS_TELNO#, USERS_COMPNAME = #USERS_COMPNAME#, USERS_DEPARTMENT = #USERS_DEPARTMENT#, USERS_JOBTITLE = #USERS_JOBTITLE# WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#

UPDATE USERS
USERS_MAIL_QUOTA = #USERS_MAIL_QUOTA#
WHERE SUBSTR(USERS_IDX, INSTR(USERS_IDX, '@')) = '@'||#DOMAIN#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DD.USERS_IDX, DD.USERS_ID, DD.DOMAIN, DD.USERS_NAME, DD.USERS_PERMIT, DD.USERS_AUTH, BB.ORGANIZE_IDX, BB.ORGANIZE_NAME, CC.AUTHORITY_IDX, CC.AUTHORITY_NAME, CEIL((ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY DD.$orderCol$ $orderType$))/$USERS_LISTNUM$) PAGENUM FROM USERS DD LEFT JOIN ORGANIZE BB ON DD.USERS_ORGANIZE_IDX = BB.ORGANIZE_IDX LEFT JOIN AUTHORITY CC ON DD.USERS_AUTHORITY_IDX = CC.AUTHORITY_IDX
DD.DOMAIN = #DOMAIN#
DD.USERS_PERMIT = #USERS_PERMIT#
DD.$strIndex$ LIKE '%'||#strKeyword#||'%'
) WHERE PAGENUM = #nPage#

SELECT COUNT(AA.USERS_IDX) CNT FROM USERS AA LEFT JOIN ORGANIZE BB ON AA.USERS_ORGANIZE_IDX = BB.ORGANIZE_IDX LEFT JOIN AUTHORITY CC ON AA.USERS_AUTHORITY_IDX = CC.AUTHORITY_IDX
AA.DOMAIN = #DOMAIN#
AA.USERS_PERMIT = #USERS_PERMIT#
AA.$strIndex$ LIKE '%'||#strKeyword#||'%'

SELECT A.DOMAIN, A.USERS_IDX, A.USERS_ID, A.USERS_NAME, A.USERS_JUMIN1, A.USERS_JUMIN2, A.USERS_LICENCENUM, NVL(A.MEMBER_IDX,0) AS MEMBER_IDX, NVL(A.ORGANIZE_IDX,0) AS ORGANIZE_IDX, NVL(A.AUTHORITY_IDX,0) AS AUTHORITY_IDX FROM ( SELECT USERS.DOMAIN, USERS.USERS_IDX, USERS.USERS_ID, USERS.USERS_NAME, USERS.USERS_JUMIN1, USERS.USERS_JUMIN2, USERS.USERS_LICENCENUM, MEMBER.MEMBER_IDX, MEMBER.ORGANIZE_IDX, MEMBER.AUTHORITY_IDX , CEIL((ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY USERS.$orderCol$ $orderType$))/$USERS_LISTNUM$) PAGENUM
FROM USERS LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON USERS.USERS_IDX = MEMBER.USERS_IDX WHERE MEMBER.USERS_IDX IS NULL
FROM USERS LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON USERS.USERS_IDX = MEMBER.USERS_IDX WHERE MEMBER.USERS_IDX IS NOT NULL
FROM USERS LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON USERS.USERS_IDX = MEMBER.USERS_IDX WHERE MEMBER.USERS_IDX IS NOT NULL AND MEMBER.ORGANIZE_IDX = #ORGANIZE_IDX#
AND MEMBER.AUTHORITY_IDX = 0
AND MEMBER.AUTHORITY_IDX = #AUTHORITY_IDX#
AND concat(MEMBER.USERS_JUMIN1,'-',MEMBER.USERS_JUMIN2) = #strKeyword#
AND USERS.USERS_NAME LIKE '%'||#strKeyword#||'%'
AND USERS.USERS_ID LIKE '%'||#strKeyword#||'%'
AND USERS.USERS_LICENCENUM LIKE '%'||#strKeyword#||'%'
AND USERS.DOMAIN = #DOMAIN# )A WHERE PAGENUM = #nPage#

SELECT count(USERS.USERS_IDX)
FROM USERS LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON USERS.USERS_IDX = MEMBER.USERS_IDX WHERE MEMBER.USERS_IDX IS NULL
FROM USERS LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON USERS.USERS_IDX = MEMBER.USERS_IDX WHERE MEMBER.USERS_IDX IS NOT NULL
FROM USERS LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON USERS.USERS_IDX = MEMBER.USERS_IDX WHERE MEMBER.USERS_IDX IS NOT NULL AND MEMBER.ORGANIZE_IDX = #ORGANIZE_IDX#
AND MEMBER.AUTHORITY_IDX = 0
AND MEMBER.AUTHORITY_IDX = #AUTHORITY_IDX#
AND concat(MEMBER.USERS_JUMIN1,'-',MEMBER.USERS_JUMIN2) = #strKeyword#
AND USERS.USERS_NAME LIKE '%'||#strKeyword#||'%'
AND USERS.USERS_ID LIKE '%'||#strKeyword#||'%'
AND USERS.USERS_LICENCENUM LIKE '%'||#strKeyword#||'%'
AND USERS.DOMAIN = #DOMAIN#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT AA.USERS_IDX, AA.USERS_ID, AA.USERS_CELLNO, AA.USERS_NAME, AA.USERS_SMS_QUOTA, CEIL((ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY AA.$orderCol$ $orderType$))/$USERS_LISTNUM$) PAGENUM FROM USERS AA
AA.DOMAIN = #DOMAIN#
AA.$strIndex$ LIKE '%'||#strKeyword#||'%'
) WHERE PAGENUM = #nPage#

SELECT COUNT(AA.USERS_IDX) CNT FROM USERS AA
AA.DOMAIN = #DOMAIN#
AA.$strIndex$ LIKE '%'||#strKeyword#||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT AA.USERS_IDX, AA.USERS_ID, AA.DOMAIN, AA.USERS_PASSWD, AA.USERS_NAME, AA.USERS_ENGNAME, AA.USERS_HOMEDIR, AA.USERS_PERMIT, AA.USERS_AUTH, AA.USERS_NICKNAME, AA.USERS_JUMIN1, AA.USERS_JUMIN2, AA.USERS_SEX, AA.USERS_BIRTH, AA.USERS_ISSOLAR, AA.USERS_CELLNO, AA.USERS_FAXNO, AA.USERS_TELNO, AA.USERS_ZIPCODE, AA.USERS_ADDRESS1, AA.USERS_ADDRESS2, AA.USERS_JOBCODE, AA.USERS_COMPNAME, AA.USERS_DEPARTMENT, AA.USERS_PREVEMAIL, AA.USERS_SCHOOLING, AA.USERS_INTEREST, AA.USERS_LICENCENUM, AA.USERS_ISOPEN, AA.USERS_JOINDATE, AA.USERS_EXPIREDDATE, AA.USERS_LOGCOUNT, AA.USERS_LASTHOST, AA.USERS_MAX_VOLUME, AA.USERS_CUR_VOLUME, AA.USERS_LASTDATE, AA.USERS_SIGNATURE, AA.USERS_SIGNATURESTMT, AA.USERS_AUTORE, AA.USERS_AUTORESTMT, AA.USERS_USENAME, AA.USERS_SENDBOX, AA.USERS_DELBOX, AA.USERS_AUTO_DEL, AA.USERS_LISTNUM, AA.USERS_ISVOTE, AA.USERS_ABSENT, TO_CHAR(AA.USERS_ABSENT_SDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USERS_ABSENT_SDATE, TO_CHAR(AA.USERS_ABSENT_EDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USERS_ABSENT_EDATE, AA.USERS_ABSENT_RESTMT, AA.USERS_OPT_FWD, AA.USERS_OPT_FWD_SAVE, AA.USERS_FWD_LIST, AA.USERS_READDR, AA.USERS_SPAM_LEVEL, AA.USERS_DEL_WASTE, AA.USERS_DEL_SPAM, AA.USERS_LANG, AA.USERS_MAIL_ALARM, AA.USERS_ALARM_SOUND, AA.USERS_INDEX_PAGE, AA.USERS_RECEIVE_INFOMAIL, AA.USERS_MAIL_VIEW, AA.USERS_MAIL_INJURE, AA.USERS_ORGANIZE_IDX, AA.USERS_AUTHORITY_IDX, AA.USERS_SMS_QUOTA, AA.USERS_SMS_MAX_QUOTA, AA.USERS_MAIL_QUOTA, AA.USERS_MEMO, AA.USERS_MSG_YN, AA.USERS_MENTO_YN, AA.USERS_USETAG, AA.USERS_USE_MAIL_PREVIEW, AA.USERS_BOARD_AUTH, AA.USERS_INFO_OPEN_AGREEMENT, AA.USERS_FWD_AUTH, AA.USERS_DELEGATE, AA.USERS_DELEGATE_LIST, CEIL((ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY $orderCol$ $orderType$))/$USERS_LISTNUM$) PAGENUM FROM USERS AA
AA.DOMAIN = #DOMAIN#
AA.USERS_ID = #USERS_ID#
AA.USERS_NAME = #USERS_NAME#
AA.USERS_PERMIT = #USERS_PERMIT#
AA.USERS_AUTH = #USERS_AUTH#
AA.USERS_DELEGATE = #USERS_DELEGATE#
AA.USERS_ID LIKE '%'||#strKeyword#||'%'
AA.USERS_NAME LIKE '%'||#strKeyword#||'%'
AA.USERS_JUMIN1||AA.USERS_JUMIN2 LIKE '%'||REPLACE(#strKeyword#, '-', '')||'%'
AA.USERS_DEPARTMENT LIKE '%'||#strKeyword#||'%'
AA.USERS_LICENCENUM LIKE '%'||#strKeyword#||'%'
AA.USERS_FWD_AUTH LIKE '%'||#strKeyword#||'%'
AA.USERS_FWD_LIST LIKE '%'||#strKeyword#||'%'
AA.USERS_INFO_OPEN_AGREEMENT LIKE '%'||#strKeyword#||'%'
) CC
WHERE CC.PAGENUM = #nPage#

SELECT COUNT(AA.USERS_IDX) CNT FROM USERS AA
AA.DOMAIN = #DOMAIN#
AA.USERS_ID = #USERS_ID#
AA.USERS_NAME = #USERS_NAME#
AA.USERS_PERMIT = #USERS_PERMIT#
AA.USERS_AUTH = #USERS_AUTH#
AA.USERS_DELEGATE = #USERS_DELEGATE#
AA.USERS_ID LIKE '%'||#strKeyword#||'%'
AA.USERS_NAME LIKE '%'||#strKeyword#||'%'
AA.USERS_JUMIN1||AA.USERS_JUMIN2 LIKE '%'||REPLACE(#strKeyword#, '-', '')||'%'
AA.USERS_DEPARTMENT LIKE '%'||#strKeyword#||'%'
AA.USERS_LICENCENUM LIKE '%'||#strKeyword#||'%'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE USERS SET USERS_MAIL_QUOTA = USERS_MAIL_QUOTA - #USERS_MAIL_QUOTA# WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX# AND USERS_MAIL_QUOTA - #USERS_MAIL_QUOTA# >= 0
sqlMap.select: SELECT USERS_SIGNATURESTMT FROM USERS WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
SELECT U.USERS_IDX FROM USERS U, ORGANIZE O, MEMBER M WHERE O.ORGANIZE_IDX = #ORGANIZE_IDX# AND O.DOMAIN = #DOMAIN# AND O.ORGANIZE_IDX = M.ORGANIZE_IDX AND M.USERS_IDX = U.USERS_IDX
SELECT USERS_IDX FROM USERS WHERE DOMAIN = #DOMAIN#
SELECT $COLUMN_NAME$ FROM USERS WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
SELECT USERS_AUTORESTMT FROM USERS WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE USERS set USERS_PWD_FAIL_DATE = sysdate , USERS_PWD_FAIL_COUNT = USERS_PWD_FAIL_COUNT +1 WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
UPDATE USERS SET USERS_PERMIT='N' , USERS_PWD_LOCKED='Y' WHERE USERS_IDX=#USERS_IDX#
UPDATE USERS SET USERS_PERMIT='C', USERS_ACCOUNT_CHANGE_DATE=SYSDATE, USERS_OPT_FWD='Y', USERS_OPT_FWD_SAVE='N', USERS_FWD_LIST=#AFTER_USERS_IDX# WHERE USERS_IDX=#BEFORE_USERS_IDX#
UPDATE USERS SET USERS_PWD_FAIL_COUNT =0 , USERS_PWD_LOCKED ='N' WHERE USERS_IDX=#USERS_IDX#
sqlMap.select: SELECT USERS_INFO_OPEN_AGREEMENT FROM USERS WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE USERS
USERS_FWD_AUTH = #USERS_FWD_AUTH#
USERS_FWD_AUTH = #USERS_FWD_AUTH#, USERS_OPT_FWD = 'N'
WHERE USERS_IDX=#USERS_IDX#
sqlMap.select: SELECT USERS_IDX, USERS_PASSWD FROM USERS WHERE USERS_IDX IN ($USERS_IDX$)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE USERS SET USERS_FWD_AUTH='Y'
UPDATE USERS SET USERS_FWD_AUTH='N', USERS_OPT_FWD = 'N'
sqlMap.select: SELECT AA.USERS_IDX, AA.USERS_ID, AA.USERS_NAME, AA.USERS_ENGNAME FROM USERS AA WHERE AA.DOMAIN = #DOMAIN# AND AA.USERS_PERMIT = 'S' AND ( AA.USERS_ID LIKE #liveQueryStr#||'%' OR AA.USERS_NAME LIKE '%'||#liveQueryStr#||'%' OR AA.USERS_ENGNAME LIKE '%'||#liveQueryStr#||'%' )
SELECT A.USERS_ID FROM USERS A WHERE A.USERS_LICENCENUM = #USERS_LICENCENUM#

SELECT A.USERS_IDX, A.USERS_PASSWD, A.USERS_NAME, B.USERS_PREVEMAIL, B.USERS_CELLNO, B.USERS_LICENCENUM FROM USERS A WHERE A.USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX# AND A.USERS_JUMIN1 = #USERS_JUMIN1# AND A.USERS_JUMIN2 = #USERS_JUMIN2# AND A.USERS_LICENCENUM = #USERS_LICENCENUM#
SELECT A.USERS_IDX, A.USERS_PASSWD, A.USERS_NAME, A.USERS_PREVEMAIL, A.USERS_CELLNO, A.USERS_LICENCENUM FROM USERS A WHERE A.USERS_ID = #USERS_ID# AND A.USERS_NAME = #USERS_NAME#
SELECT USERS_ID FROM USERS WHERE USERS_NAME = #USERS_NAME# AND USERS_LICENCENUM = #USERS_LICENCENUM#
SELECT USERS_ID FROM USERS WHERE USERS_NAME = #USERS_NAME# AND USERS_JUMIN1 = #USERS_JUMIN1# AND USERS_JUMIN2 = #USERS_JUMIN2#

SELECT USERS_IDX, USERS_PASSWD, USERS_NAME, USERS_PREVEMAIL, USERS_CELLNO FROM USERS WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX# AND USERS_NAME = #USERS_NAME# AND USERS_JUMIN1 = #USERS_JUMIN1# AND USERS_JUMIN2 = #USERS_JUMIN2#
SELECT * FROM USERS_TEMP WHERE USERS_NAME = #USERS_NAME# AND USERS_JUMIN1 = #USERS_JUMIN1# AND USERS_JUMIN2 = #USERS_JUMIN2# AND USERS_LICENCENUM = #USERS_LICENCENUM#

SELECT DISTINCT A.USERS_CELLNO FROM ( SELECT USERS_CELLNO FROM USERS
#EMAIL[]#
AND LENGTH(TRIM(USERS_CELLNO)) > 0 UNION SELECT ADDRESS_CELLTEL AS USERS_CELLNO FROM ADDRESS WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
#EMAIL[]#
AND LENGTH(TRIM(ADDRESS_CELLTEL)) > 0 )A
SELECT A.USERS_IDX, A.USERS_ID, A.USERS_NAME, A.USERS_PASSWD FROM USERS A WHERE A.USERS_LICENCENUM = #USERS_LICENCENUM#
SELECT USERS_IDX FROM USERS WHERE USERS_DELEGATE = #USERS_DELEGATE# AND USERS_DELEGATE_LIST LIKE '%'||#USERS_IDX#||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT USERS_LICENCENUM, USERS_NAME, USERS_DEPARTMENT, USERS_COMPNAME, CEIL((ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY $orderCol$ $orderType$))/$USERS_LISTNUM$) PAGENUM FROM USERS_TEMP
USERS_LICENCENUM LIKE '%'||#USERS_LICENCENUM[]#||'%'
USERS_NAME LIKE '%'||#USERS_NAME[]#||'%'
USERS_DEPARTMENT LIKE '%'||#USERS_DEPARTMENT[]#||'%'
) CC
WHERE CC.PAGENUM = #nPage#

SELECT COUNT(USERS_LICENCENUM) CNT FROM USERS_TEMP
USERS_LICENCENUM LIKE '%'||#USERS_LICENCENUM[]#||'%'
USERS_NAME LIKE '%'||#USERS_NAME[]#||'%'
USERS_DEPARTMENT LIKE '%'||#USERS_DEPARTMENT[]#||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.USERS_ID, A.USERS_NAME, A.USERS_COMPNAME, A.USERS_DEPARTMENT, A.USERS_CELLNO, A.USERS_JOBCODE, CEIL((ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY $orderCol$ $orderType$))/$USERS_LISTNUM$) PAGENUM FROM USERS A, USER_GROUP_LIST C , USER_GROUP D WHERE A.USERS_IDX = C.USERS_IDX AND C.USER_GROUP_IDX = D.USER_GROUP_IDX AND A.USERS_NAME IS NOT NULL AND A.USERS_COMPNAME IS NOT NULL
A.USERS_ID LIKE '%'||#USERS_ID[]#||'%'
A.USERS_NAME LIKE '%'||#USERS_NAME[]#||'%'
A.USERS_DEPARTMENT LIKE '%'||#USERS_DEPARTMENT[]#||'%'
) CC
WHERE CC.PAGENUM = #nPage#

SELECT COUNT(A.USERS_IDX) CNT FROM USERS A USER_GROUP_LIST C , USER_GROUP D WHERE A.USERS_IDX = C.USERS_IDX AND C.USER_GROUP_IDX = D.USER_GROUP_IDX AND A.USERS_NAME IS NOT NULL AND A.USERS_COMPNAME IS NOT NULL
A.USERS_ID LIKE '%'||#USERS_ID[]#||'%'
A.USERS_NAME LIKE '%'||#USERS_NAME[]#||'%'
A.USERS_DEPARTMENT LIKE '%'||#USERS_DEPARTMENT[]#||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.USERS_ID, A.USERS_NAME, A.USERS_DEPARTMENT, A.USERS_COMPNAME, A.USERS_CELLNO, A.USERS_EXPIREDDATE2, CEIL((ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY $orderCol$ $orderType$))/$USERS_LISTNUM$) PAGENUM FROM USERS A WHERE USERS_EXPIREDDATE2 IS NOT NULL
A.USERS_ID LIKE '%'||#USERS_ID[]#||'%'
A.USERS_NAME LIKE '%'||#USERS_NAME[]#||'%'
A.USERS_DEPARTMENT LIKE '%'||#USERS_DEPARTMENT[]#||'%'
) CC
WHERE CC.PAGENUM = #nPage#

SELECT COUNT(A.USERS_ID) CNT FROM USERS A WHERE USERS_EXPIREDDATE2 IS NOT NULL
A.USERS_ID LIKE '%'||#USERS_ID[]#||'%'
A.USERS_NAME LIKE '%'||#USERS_NAME[]#||'%'
A.USERS_DEPARTMENT LIKE '%'||#USERS_DEPARTMENT[]#||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT USERS_LICENCENUM, USERS_NAME, USERS_DEPARTMENT, USERS_COMPNAME FROM USERS_TEMP
USERS_LICENCENUM LIKE '%'||#USERS_LICENCENUM[]#||'%'
USERS_NAME LIKE '%'||#USERS_NAME[]#||'%'
USERS_DEPARTMENT LIKE '%'||#USERS_DEPARTMENT[]#||'%'
)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.USERS_ID, A.USERS_NAME, A.USERS_COMPNAME, A.USERS_DEPARTMENT, A.USERS_CELLNO, A.USERS_JOBCODE FROM USERS A WHERE A.USERS_NAME IS NOT NULL AND A.USERS_COMPNAME IS NOT NULL
A.USERS_ID LIKE '%'||#USERS_ID[]#||'%'
A.USERS_NAME LIKE '%'||#USERS_NAME[]#||'%'
A.USERS_DEPARTMENT LIKE '%'||#USERS_DEPARTMENT[]#||'%'
)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT USERS_ID, USERS_NAME, USERS_DEPARTMENT, USERS_COMPNAME, USERS_CELLNO, USERS_EXPIREDDATE2 FROM USERS A WHERE USERS_EXPIREDDATE2 IS NOT NULL
A.USERS_ID LIKE '%'||#USERS_ID[]#||'%'
A.USERS_NAME LIKE '%'||#USERS_NAME[]#||'%'
A.USERS_DEPARTMENT LIKE '%'||#USERS_DEPARTMENT[]#||'%'
)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE USERS SET USERS_HOMEDIR = #USERS_HOMEDIR# WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
UPDATE USERS SET TAG_FILTER_LEVEL = #TAG_FILTER_LEVEL#
UPDATE USERS SET TAG_FILTER_LEVEL = #TAG_FILTER_LEVEL# WHERE USERS_IDX=#USERS_IDX#

UPDATE USERS SET USERS_PWD_LOCKED ='N'
USERS_PASSWD = #USERS_PASSWD#
USERS_NAME = #USERS_NAME#
USERS_ENGNAME = #USERS_ENGNAME#
USERS_CELLNO = #USERS_CELLNO#
USERS_FAXNO = #USERS_FAXNO#
USERS_TELNO = #USERS_TELNO#
USERS_ZIPCODE = #USERS_ZIPCODE#
USERS_ZIPCODE = #USERS_ZIPCODE#
USERS_ADDRESS1 = #USERS_ADDRESS1#
USERS_ADDRESS2 = #USERS_ADDRESS2#
USERS_JUMIN1 = #USERS_JUMIN1#
USERS_JUMIN2 = #USERS_JUMIN2#
WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT AA.USERS_IDX, AA.USERS_ID, AA.DOMAIN, AA.USERS_PASSWD, AA.USERS_NAME, AA.USERS_ENGNAME, AA.USERS_HOMEDIR, AA.USERS_PERMIT, AA.USERS_AUTH, AA.USERS_NICKNAME, AA.USERS_JUMIN1, AA.USERS_JUMIN2, AA.USERS_SEX, AA.USERS_BIRTH, AA.USERS_ISSOLAR, AA.USERS_CELLNO, AA.USERS_FAXNO, AA.USERS_TELNO, AA.USERS_ZIPCODE, AA.USERS_ADDRESS1, AA.USERS_ADDRESS2, AA.USERS_JOBCODE, AA.USERS_COMPNAME, AA.USERS_DEPARTMENT, AA.USERS_JOBTITLE, AA.USERS_PREVEMAIL, AA.USERS_SCHOOLING, AA.USERS_INTEREST, AA.USERS_LICENCENUM, AA.USERS_ISOPEN, AA.USERS_JOINDATE, AA.USERS_EXPIREDDATE, AA.USERS_LOGCOUNT, AA.USERS_LASTHOST, AA.USERS_MAX_VOLUME, AA.USERS_CUR_VOLUME, AA.USERS_LASTDATE, AA.USERS_SIGNATURE, AA.USERS_SIGNATURESTMT, AA.USERS_AUTORE, AA.USERS_AUTORESTMT, AA.USERS_USENAME, AA.USERS_SENDBOX, AA.USERS_DELBOX, AA.USERS_AUTO_DEL, AA.USERS_LISTNUM, AA.USERS_ISVOTE, AA.USERS_ABSENT, TO_CHAR(AA.USERS_ABSENT_SDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USERS_ABSENT_SDATE, TO_CHAR(AA.USERS_ABSENT_EDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USERS_ABSENT_EDATE, AA.USERS_ABSENT_RESTMT, AA.USERS_OPT_FWD, AA.USERS_OPT_FWD_SAVE, AA.USERS_FWD_LIST, AA.USERS_READDR, AA.USERS_SPAM_LEVEL, AA.USERS_DEL_WASTE, AA.USERS_DEL_SPAM, AA.USERS_LANG, AA.USERS_MAIL_ALARM, AA.USERS_ALARM_SOUND, AA.USERS_INDEX_PAGE, AA.USERS_RECEIVE_INFOMAIL, AA.USERS_MAIL_VIEW, AA.USERS_MAIL_INJURE, AA.USERS_ORGANIZE_IDX, AA.USERS_AUTHORITY_IDX, AA.USERS_SMS_QUOTA, AA.USERS_SMS_MAX_QUOTA, AA.USERS_MAIL_QUOTA, AA.USERS_MEMO, AA.USERS_MSG_YN, AA.USERS_MENTO_YN, AA.USERS_USETAG, AA.USERS_USE_MAIL_PREVIEW, AA.MAX_BIG_UPLOAD_SIZE, AA.USERS_PWD_FAIL_COUNT, AA.USERS_PWD_LOCKED , AA.USERS_BOARD_AUTH, AA.USERS_INFO_OPEN_AGREEMENT, AA.USERS_FWD_AUTH, TO_CHAR(AA.USERS_JOINDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USERS_JOINDATE, AA.USERS_AUTORE_LIST, AA.USERS_OPT_AUTORE, AA.USERS_DELEGATE, AA.USERS_DELEGATE_LIST, AA.USERS_LOGIN_MODE , AA.USERS_BG_COLOR, AA.USERS_MAIL_VIEW_MODE, AA.TAG_FILTER_LEVEL FROM USERS AA
AA.USERS_LICENCENUM = #USERS_LICENCENUM#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE USERS SET USERS_PERMIT = 'S' WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
UPDATE USERS SET USERS_DEPARTMENT = #GROUP_NAME# WHERE USERS_IDX = #USERS_IDX#
